resources.string: \nPlease check your email to verify your account.

Thankyou for your patience.. we will need to add other fragments/actvities for each of the bottons

Rergardless of how your carbon emission, we can all contribute to helping reduce carbonmissoin. We understand it is at times difficult to neutrilize emmiision, that we cannot control through sustainable behaviors habits.
We have provided offset emission projects, which can help offset you carbon emission. Through purchasing carbon credits.

- Air Purifiers 
 - Clothes Dryer 
 - Computer 
 - Light Bulbs 
 - Cookers 
 - Solar 
 - Electric vehicle chargers

- Eileen Fisher 
 - Patagonia 
 - Tentree 
 - Outerknown 
 - Jungmaven 
 - Kotn 
 - Harvest & Mill 
 - Allbirds
